cells.data:
Bundle Identifier Setup: Got to https://developer.apple.com/account/ios/identifier/bundle and create new App ID
 Got to https://itunesconnect.apple.com/WebObjects/iTunesConnect.woa/da/jumpTo?page=contracts (iTunes Connect). Everything should be set up here.
 Go to https://itunesconnect.apple.com/WebObjects/iTunesConnect.woa/ra/ng/app  and add your app
 Go to https://itunesconnect.apple.com/WebObjects/iTunesConnect.woa/ra/ng/app/YOUR-APP-ID/addons
 Go to https://itunesconnect.apple.com/WebObjects/iTunesConnect.woa/ra/ng/users_roles and set up a test user
